text:
e="preserve">Michael Edward O'Malley (born October 31, 1966) is an American actor and writer. He was born in Boston, Massachusetts and raised in Nashua, New Hampshire.
O'Malley hosted the early 1990s children's game show "Nickelodeon Guts". He starred in his own sitcom for NBC called "The Mike O'Malley Show". He is best known for his role as Jimmy Hughes on "Yes, Dear", a CBS series which aired from 2000 to 2006.
He was nominated for an Emmy Award for his role as Burt Hummel on the Fox series "Glee".
